duties_responsibilities.duty: Cash handling, fuel transactions, cleaning, and stocking inventory.
Food preparation and foodservice safety for foodservice positions.
Provide excellent customer service and create a positive in-store experience for customers.
Enroll customers in rewards loyalty program and promote its benefits.
Maintain clean and safe store environment, including adherence to health code guidelines.
Ability to multi-task, perform repeated bending, standing, and reaching, and occasionally lifting up to 50 pounds.
